text: Lucien Dirksz (born 29 September 1968) is an Aruban former cyclist. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. During the 1992 Summer Olympics opening ceremony Dirksz was the flag bearer for Aruba.Aruba. Olympics at Sport-Reference.com. Sports Reference LLC.
